title: request for a club
body:
Sir,
I live in Asia. I am a citizen of Bangladesh. There are many children in our country who prefer gaming. Unfortunately in our country too would like to, but there is no better club in the game where we can learn and know everything.

replies.body: একটি গ্রুপ একসাথে পেতে? এই সঙ্গে আপনাকে সাহায্য করার জন্য আপনার সম্প্রদায় সংগঠিত চেষ্টা.

I'm sorry, but I'm having a hard time what you're needing assistance with. If you're looking to create a club in-game, you can refer to our [Clubs Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207994746-Guide-to-Clubs). If this wasn't what you were looking for, please do your best to clarify what you need help with and I'll do my best!
